item.title: Hello Internet!
item.description:
Hello internet!

This website was created using hugo. It is hosted on a raspberry pi running on nixos, it’s entirely declaritive! Have a look at the source code for the static over here: https://github.com/MartV0/personal-site . The nix source code will be uploaded on my github at some time too!

item.title: My projects
item.description:
Here is a short list of some of my projects!

  • My dotfiles: My personal dotfiles, including configuration for neovim, qtile, (doom)emacs and more! They’re probably a bit to personalised to me to be useful to use directly, but could be useful to have a look for insparation.
  • This website: My personal website!
  • AliExpresPaymentsParser: A small script I wrote for my sister that parses AliExpress payment pdf’s into an excel file.
